txt.en: 'This will do well, [placeholder]. You have the thanks of the smiths of Forlaw.'
<rgb=#FF0000>Completing Wildermore's Recovery will cancel this quest.</rgb>
Forge a wrought iron ingot for the workers of Wildermore ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
A skilled crafter such as yourself can help the refugees of Wildermore by crafting a wrought iron ingot for them.
'I hear you are a very skilled prospector, [placeholder]. Do you think there is anything you could make for the smiths of Forlaw?\n\n'Here is a recipe I have on hand. Is this helpful?'
Hildelith has given you a recipe for a wrought iron ingot.\n\nYou should forge a wrought iron ingot for the workers trying to rebuild after NÃºrzum's destruction.
Deliver the wrought iron ingot to Hildelith
Hildelith is in Forlaw.\n\nYou have forged a wrought iron ingot, and should now deliver it to Hildelith.
